charges.charge_disposition: The Defendant Pleaded Guilty to Count 1,2, And 3 on 9/21/2010 of The Indictment. Imprisonment: The Defendant is Hereby Committed to The Custody of The United States Bureau of Prisons to be Imprisoned For A Total Term of 480 Months on Counts 1 And 2 to Run Concurrently And 240 Months on Count 3 to Run Concurrent to Counts 1 And 2 For A Total Incarceration of 480 Months. The Court Recommends to The Bureau of Prisons: That Defendant be Placed in The Facility Located in Butner, Nc. The Defendant is Remanded to The Custody of The United States Marshal. Supervised Release: Upon Release From Imprisonment, The Defendant Shall be on Supervised Release For A Term of Life on Counts 1, 2 And 3 to Run Concurrently. $300 Msa. no Fine or Restitution.
